metadata.name: Renminbang - Pink
metadata.description: RENMINBANG is the visual representation of how inflation has affected the Yuan. China’s economy faces currency devaluation drag. Beijing’s decision to let the renminbi fall below the symbolic level of 7 to the dollar was a political choice, but it would not be in China’s economic interests to “weaponise” its currency, economists say. That why Mao got shot with a weapon multiple times in the painting.
